wordGroup: renal transplantation 肾移植，肾脏移植
lung transplantation 肺移植，肺移植术
hair transplantation 毛发移植；毛移植术

sentences.en: Professor Bruce Lahn of the University of Chicago predicts that humans won't have to donate organs for transplantation.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥大学的 Bruce Lahn 教授预测，人类将不必捐献器官来进行移植。

sentences.en: Late staged pneumonoconiosis is one of the best indication for isolated lung transplantation.
sentences.cn: 晚期尘肺病是分离肺移植的最佳指征之一。

sentences.en: Models of segmental heterotopic small intestine transplantation were established using three sleevelet vascular anastomosis.
sentences.cn: 采用三袖套血管吻合法建立大鼠节段性异位小肠移植模型。
